```{r reorder}
#Reorder data

data %<>%
  select(bioname.x, yearelected.x, member_reelected, congress, TYPE, everything())

data %<>%
  filter(!is.na(TYPE))

```

#Histogram of observations in each congress
```{r hist}
data %>%
  with(hist(congress))
```



```{r typeTab}

data %>%
  with(table(TYPE))

```

```{r cong106}

data %>%
  filter(congress %in% 106) %>%
  with(table(TYPE, party, member_reelected, yearelected.x, as.factor(agency)))
```
